= Introduction =
A detailed sample for the ResponseHeaderFilter config file.
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<response-header-mapper>
  <!-- response header rules for all suggest related headers -->
  <mapping url="/ajax/suggest">
    <default>
      <response-headers>
	<header key="Content-Type" value="application/x-javascript"/>
        <header key="Cache-Control" value="private, max-age=3600"/>
      </response-headers>
    </default>

    <conditional queryParamName="type" queryParamValue="neighbourhoodSuggest">
      <response-headers>
        <header key="Content-Type" value="application/x-javascript"/>
        <header key="Cache-Control" value="private, max-age=86400"/>
      </response-headers>
    </conditional>
  </mapping>

  <!-- response header rules the js resource bundle servlet -->
  <mapping url="/js/resource-bundle.html">
    <default>
      <response-headers>
	<header key="Content-Type" value="application/x-javascript"/>
        <header key="Cache-Control" value="private, max-age=86400"/>
      </response-headers>
    </default>
  </mapping>

  <!-- response header rules for the geo-drop down actions -->
  <mapping url="/ajax/geo-list.html">
    <default>
      <response-headers>
	<header key="Content-Type" value="text/xml"/>
        <header key="Cache-Control" value="private, max-age=86400"/>
      </response-headers>
    </default>
  </mapping>

  <!-- response header rules for all the json requests (sendToPhone, clickToCall etc) -->
  <mapping url="/json/(.*).html">
    <default>
      <response-headers>
	<header key="Content-Type" value="application/javascript"/>
        <header key="Cache-Control" value="no-cache"/>
      </response-headers>
    </default>
  </mapping>
</response-header-mapper>
}}}
